name: public-art-registry
description: A community-driven platform for documenting and preserving public art

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:workers
scripts.deploy: npm run test && npm run deploy:frontend && npm run deploy:workers
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:frontend && npm run type-check:workers && npm run type-check:shared
scripts.log: node scripts/run_and_log.cjs npx wrangler tail public-art-registry-api --format pretty --env production production-server-logs.txt
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:workers
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:frontend:coverage && npm run test:workers:coverage
scripts.quality: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test
scripts.database:migration:prod: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply public-art-registry --env production --remote --config src/workers/wrangler.toml
scripts.database:migration:dev: npx wrangler d1 migrations apply public-art-registry --env development --local --config src/workers/wrangler.toml
scripts.database:status:prod: npx wrangler d1 migrations list public-art-registry --env production --remote --config src/workers/wrangler.toml
scripts.database:status:dev: npx wrangler d1 migrations list public-art-registry --env development --local --config src/workers/wrangler.toml
scripts.database:create-migration: echo 'Usage: cd src/workers && npx wrangler d1 migrations create cultural-archiver "migration_message" --env development'
scripts.database:reset:dev: echo 'Error: To reset local database use database:reset:local
scripts.database:reset:local:comment: echo 'Resets LOCAL SQLite database used by wrangler dev (not remote). Use this for local development reset.'
scripts.admin:grant:local: echo For local development, admin user is created automatically by: && echo npm run database:reset:local && echo && echo To grant admin on remote dev database, use: && echo npm run admin:grant

author: Steven Smethurst
